attributes.action: Tax the Rich to Avoid Cuts to Services & Benefits
attributes.additional_details: The cost of living crisis is effecting everyone and giving everyone (working class) a terrible standard of living whilst there’s reports of more billionaires in Britain than ever before. We need a fairer system

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you want to see a new tax to help fund public services, but we're not sure exactly who you want this new tax to apply to, or how you want this tax to work.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
